#summary Home page for the wiki

= Welcome to mmisw =


==Starting Points==

    * Documentation -- User information in this Wiki.
    * [http://marinemetadata.org/semanticframework External Documentation]
    * [Development] -- Contains information for developing mmisw. Includes FAQs, HOWTOs, Architectural descriptions, and discussions on future directions.
    * Project Administration -- Descriptions of administration tasks, and procedures. Used by team members for running this server, and describing the release process.
    * FAQ -- Frequently asked questions 

==Recent News==

    * mmisw 1.0.0beta has been released. Demonstrated during MMI Semantic Interoperability Workshop in Boulder, CO, in November 2008

==Community==

You can participate in mmisw by joining the mailing list:

    * mmisw-dev: For developer discussion 


==Issues==

[http://code.google.com/p/mmisw/issues/list This is the place] to go to report or check on bugs and feature requests.
